title: Sauron Art Mask & Barad-dûr Statue Exclusive Edition | LOTR Unboxing
description:
Shop the PureArts The Lord of the Rings line here: https://www.purearts.com/collections/the-lord-of-the-rings?sca_ref=1728901.fPfFhiiu4f

1 of 500 "Exclusive Edition" Sauron Art Mask
Product Description:
Features:
Massive 1/1 scale detailed sculpt of Sauron’s Helmet
Full Barad-dûr replica mounting base
LED glowing lava effects
LED Eye of Sauron that can be seen through the mask
Exclusive Edition includes a lithograph concept artwork print
Individually numbered

Product Details:
Material: Polyresin
Powered by 3 AA batteries
PureArts Exclusive Edition Size: 500 units
Standard Edition Size: 7000 units
Territory: Available in North America, Europe, UK, Middle East and Africa

This Sauron Art Mask was provided by PureArts.
